column1: Constituencies which had muslim MLA in 2012 but converted to BJP aka non-muslim MLA in 2017. 48 out of 69 constituencies which had muslim MLA in 2012 converted to BJP in 2017.

List: Aligarh, Allahabad South, Badaun, Baheri, Bangermau, Barhapur, Bhadohi, Bhojipura, Bhojpur, Bilsi, Budhana, Chail, Chandpur, Charthawal, Domariyaganj, Fatehpur, Hasanpur, Husainganj, Jaunpur, Kanth, Khalilabad, Kithore, Koil, Kursi, Laharpur, Loni, Lucknow West, Meerapur, Meerganj, Mohammadabad, Moradabad Nagar, Muradnagar, Naugawan Sadat, Pathardeva, Patiyali, Phaphamau, Phulpur, Pilibhit, Rampur Karkhana, Shahabad, Shrawasti, Sikanderpur, Siwalkhas, Syana, Tanda, Tiloi, Tulsipur, Utraula.
Constituencies which had muslim MLA in 2007 and 2012, but not in 2017. All such constituencies converted to BJP in 2017.
